feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:46 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: NW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
